Sentencas: Experimental investigations on new materials for application as electrolyte in electrolyte supported planar Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (ITSOFC) operating below 800 degreesC is in progress at our laboratory.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: Sr and Mg doped Lanthanum gallate (LSGM) powder was prepared by glycine - nitrate combustion method.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: The prepared LSGM powder is relatively finer than that prepared through other techniques such as solid-state reaction.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: The measurements comprising XRD, particle size, density, TGA/DTA were made.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: Thin sections of circular pellets were fabricated and annealed at different temperatures ranging between 1000 and 1300 degreesC.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: The sintering behaviour of LSGM was investigated to obtain information on the densification factor, relative percentage shrinkage/expansion in volume, while annealing and the resulting apparent porosity values.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: Bismuth oxide is found to be an effective sintering aid in general.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: So the effect of bismuth oxide addition on LSGM was investigated through sintering studies, XRD, TGA/DTA, SEM and conductivity measurements.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (ITSOFC)

Sentencas: The results obtained on LSGM with and without bismuth oxide addition are discussed with respect to the requirement of an electrolyte for ITSOFC applications.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (ITSOFC)
